steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"coi6o","text":"PRIME Multi-Drop Combi Tube Dispensing Cassette with Assay Buffer by selecting the PRIME button on the Combi Dispenser until the tubes are filled completely. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":53,"length":12},{"style":"bold","offset":83,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
